title: Bug 118780 - Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old columns name when select the dataset.
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder and double-clicking on the first column name, the original name of the column is displayed below in the expression builder, but the alias name appears above as 'row["column1"]'.
EB: According to scr 78193 in the tracker, the first column in the expression builder should use the alias name instead of the original name.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Create a new data source and a dataset. 
2. Set the alias of the first column in the dataset to 'column1'. 
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 
4. Select the dataset in the expression builder and double-click on the first column name.
